longDef.en: in or to a position below or lower than something else, often so that one thing covers the other
longDef.cn: 在（或到）下面；在（或到）下方

examples.en: He hid under the bed.
examples.cn: 他躲在床底下。

examples.en: In AD 79 the city of Pompei was buried under a layer of ash seven metres deep.
examples.cn: 公元79年，庞贝古城被湮没在7米深的火山灰下。

examples.en: She put the thermometer under my tongue.
examples.cn: 她把温度计放到我的舌头下面。

examples.en: She was holding a folder under her arm (= between her upper arm and the side of her body).
examples.cn: 她腋下夹着一个文件夹。

examples.en: They stood under a tree (= below its branches) to avoid getting wet.
examples.cn: 他们站在树下避雨。

longDef.en: If a piece of land is under a particular type of plant, that plant is growing on the whole of that area.

examples.en: The main fields are under wheat.
examples.cn: 主要的农田都种了麦子。

longDef.en: If a book, article, or piece of information is under a particular title, you can find it below or following that title in a list, book, library, etc.
longDef.cn: （书、文章或信息）属于…类别，在…项下

examples.en: Books on Ansel Adams will probably be under Art or Photography.
examples.cn: 关于安塞尔·亚当斯的书很可能属于艺术或摄影类。

examples.en: Custard? That comes under Desserts.
examples.cn: 蛋奶甜羹？应该在甜点类中找。

examples.en: All items cost/are under a pound.
examples.cn: 所有物品价格均低于1英镑。

examples.en: The discount applies only to children under (the age of) ten (= younger than ten).
examples.cn: 折扣仅面向10岁以下儿童。

examples.en: If you get under 50 percent, you fail the exam.
examples.cn: 如果考分低于总分的一半，你就没有及格。

longDef.en: happening during, as a result of, or according to a particular situation, event, rule, etc.

examples.en: The work was completed under very difficult conditions.
examples.cn: 这项工作是在极端困难的情况下完成的。

examples.en: Now that the deadline is approaching we all feel under pressure.
examples.cn: 由于最后期限就要到了，我们都感受到了压力。

examples.en: The chair broke under his weight (= because he was too heavy for it).
examples.cn: 他太重了，椅子承受不住被压坏了。

examples.en: Under the current rules, you need the agreement of at least 6 out of 10 committee members.
examples.cn: 根据现有的规则，你必须取得委员会十位成员中至少六人的同意。

longDef.en: in the process of being attacked, considered, discussed, etc.
longDef.cn: 遭受攻击／正在考虑／正在讨论（等等）

examples.en: The town is under fire (= is being attacked) from the air.
examples.cn: 该城正遭受空袭。

examples.en: The proposals are now under consideration by the Board of Governors.
examples.cn: 理事会正在考虑这些提议。

examples.en: The situation is still not under control.
examples.cn: 局势仍然没有得到控制。

longDef.cn: 处于镇静剂／麻醉剂的作用之下

examples.en: The patient is being kept under heavy sedation.
examples.cn: 病人正处于服药后的深度镇静状态。

examples.en: She'll have to go under anaesthetic for the operation.
examples.cn: 手术前必须给她施行麻醉。

examples.en: She's been under the doctor for a viral infection.
examples.cn: 她因病毒感染接受了医生治疗。

examples.en: He was under the mistaken belief that I was in charge.
examples.cn: 他误以为是我在负责。

longDef.en: controlled or governed by a particular person, organization, or force

examples.en: He's a Colonel, with hundreds of soldiers under him (= obeying his orders).
examples.cn: 他是一名上校，手下有数百名士兵。

examples.en: I wonder what Britain was like under the Romans (= during the time when the Romans controlled Britain).
examples.cn: 我想知道英国在罗马人统治时期是什么样子。

examples.en: People born under (= during the period of) the zodiac sign Pisces are supposed to be dreamy and artistic.
examples.cn: 有人认为，双鱼座的人爱幻想、有艺术细胞。

longDef.en: to have been ordered to do something

examples.en: They're under strict orders not to discuss the situation.
examples.cn: 他们被严令不得讨论时局。

examples.en: He's under doctor's orders (= has been told by a doctor) to cut down on fatty food and to drink no alcohol for at least six months.
examples.cn: 医生告诫他要在至少半年的时间内少吃油腻食物、滴酒不沾。

longDef.en: using a particular name, especially one that is not your real name

examples.en: He writes under the name (of) John le Carré.
examples.cn: 他用约翰•勒•卡雷这个名字创作。

examples.en: For his own safety, he has to operate under a false name/an alias.
examples.cn: 为了自身安全，他不得不使用假名／化名。

examples.en: Because I'm a bad swimmer, I often go under and swallow a lot of water.
examples.cn: 因为游泳水平很差，我经常沉到水下，呛很多水。

longDef.en: not enough or not done as well or as much as is necessary

examples.en: undercooked potatoes
examples.cn: 没煮熟的土豆

examples.en: underprivileged children
examples.cn: 贫困儿童

examples.en: We're all overworked and underpaid.
examples.cn: 我们全都超时工作，但薪水却很低。

examples.en: His boss says he's under-performing (= not doing as well as he should) at work.
examples.cn: 老板说他在工作中表现欠佳。

examples.en: underwear
examples.cn: 内衣

examples.en: an underpass
examples.cn: 地下通道
